caption.title:
Relative R
0 across constant temperatures (°C; top) for Ae. albopictus (light blue) and Ae. aegypti (dark blue), and histograms of the posterior distributions of the critical thermal minimum (bottom left), temperature at peak transmission (bottom middle), and critical thermal maximum (bottom right; all in °C).
caption.p:
Solid lines: mean posterior estimates; dashed lines: 95% credible intervals. R
0 curves normalized to a 0–1 scale for ease of comparison and visualization.
